abstract: For $19 a month, a business owner runs all of her campaigns with Schedulicity, which allows her to send out e-mail blasts, Facebook posts and tweets for each new promotion.

lead_paragraph: There are hair stylists, and there are hair stylists. Tiffany Taylor specializes in management of the sort of hair that can ruin the effect of wearing a skimpy bathing suit, not to mention the effect of removing one. In industry lingo, Ms. Taylor is an “esthetician,” running her own two-person “waxing studio,” called ME Beauty, in Rochester, Mich.

headline.main: Solving 3 Marketing Problems with One Online Tool
